nodes.text: Magister of Skye, also known as the Majestrix of Skye was a title that the genetics terrorist Zeta Magnus bestowed upon himself after taking control of the planet Skye in 21 BBY. However, Magnus was foiled by the Jedi Knights Obi-Wan Kenobi, Anakin Skywalker and Halagad Ventor shortly thereafter. Early in the Galactic Civil War, the title belonged to Kharys.
